x

| 22 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) -> ( N .x. x ) = ( N .x. ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 2, 7, 11, 4, 20, 5, 6, 21, 22 | #P_gsummhm2 | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> ( N .x. X ) ) ) = ( N .x. ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) ) |
